attributes.action: give a binding undertaking to the people of this country that as long as taxpayers are required to fund foreign aid and the handing over of large amounts of taxpayer pounds to incoming foreigners who claim to be refugees (who, while taking the money promise to kill us all for being non-believers), not one of the members of the armed forces who are injured in action in Afghanistan will have to fight for financial support, as their forebears from the Northern Ireland conflict; the Falkland Island war and the first Gulf War have been required to do.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a taxpayer I find it abhorrent that my taxes are taken - in unlimited amounts - to fund the well being of people who have NEVER contributed to this country and are on record as promising to kill us all because we have a different religion to them, while soldiers returning devastatingly injured with life changing levels of disability are being made to fight for financial support which are limited to levels set by people (politicians) who have absolutely no concept of what it is like to be so disabled.  My taxes should be taken to support our people, and NOT support foreigners and foreign organisations whose raison d'etre is the destruction of our way of life.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
